overview: Jayprakash has over 27 years of experience in M&A Transaction Advisory, Support, Audit & Valuation Services. He is a Chartered Accountant (ICAI) and a Fellow of The Institute of Chartered Accountants (FCA). His clients include Wuerth Group - Germany, Valtech - France, Jaspa Group â€“ Dubai, Cheapeake Group - USA, United Brands - Dubai, Corpus - USA, ASAP Solutions, BJN Hotels, FI Sofex, Nutek India, Vertex Developers, Axes Technologies, Tusker Entertainment, S M Apparels, Inlott E-Gaming Technologies, Valuable Reserves India, Textrade, Fortune Media, Vinoram (Hoff la man Roche), Answerthink India, CharagDin, Vivus Hospital and NGEF AEG (Govt. of Karnataka).
